text: Earlier today I wrote a tweet that started getting a lot of flow. Then I thought this is possibly something Jay Rosen could endorse. So I sent an email, he RTd and then the flow went up quite a bit more. I noted, again via email: "If your influence keeps growing, you could probably solve some of journalism's problems just with your flow." I was thinking of picking out voices that weren't being heard in the journalism-centered conversations but if they were, might adjust how it covers the changed world as we find it today. :boom:
